H0.text: It bends when light passes from air to water.

H1.text: It contracts when light passes from air to water.

H2.text: It brightens is what happens to light when it passes from air to water.

H3.text: It speeds up when light passes from air to water.

A4.text: When light enters a slower medium at an angle, one side of the wavefront is slowed before the other. This asymmetrical slowing of the light causes it to change the angle of its travel.

A5.text: The speed of light is slower in a medium other than vacuum.
